item.title: Trump says he will delay tariffs on European Union until July 9
item.description: Trump said that he and the Europeans intend to “rapidly get together and see if we can work something out.”

item.title: Senators eye more budget bill cuts despite House speaker’s plea for few changes
item.description: The biggest hurdle in the Senate for Trump’s tax and immigration bill could come — like it did in the House — from deficit hawks who demand more cuts.

item.title: Veterans recoil at Trump plan to end Afghans’ deportation protection
item.description: The Trump administration claims conditions in Afghanistan have markedly improved under Taliban rule. Those who fought in the war say that’s ‘laughable...

item.title: The ‘Big Beautiful Bill’ is a big risk for House Republicans. Many of them hope otherwise.

item.title: Steve Scalise leads outside the glare of the House speakership
